ygData.subject: Arena
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can be bound anywhere in the Arena zone.  The PvP area does not start until you enter the stadium.  Everything outside of it is no-PvP.  (There seem to
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Dec 1999, Papa Legba wrote:
>
> My party is is heading to SPlitpaw tonight (might as well do it before
> they change it)... People have said to get bound in the arena off Lake
> Rathtear.
>
> Is this possible? Are you PVP as soon as you get into the arena?

You can be bound anywhere in the Arena zone. The PvP area
does not start until you enter the stadium. Everything
outside of it is no-PvP. (There seem to be sections inside
which are no-PvP as well, but I'll leave investigating those
as an exercise for the reader.)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
